name: Super Astral Blitz
description:
Made during Global Game Jam 2017, Super Astral Blitz is a competitive physics-based shooter where player ships must dodge oncoming asteroids while firing them at their opponent.

The game is very short with a very quick turnaround for repeated play. It was made by three people over the course of 2 days.

Art/animation: August Brown

Programming/testing: Dan Kaiser

Programming/concept: Ryan Schaefer
